title.value: AI Clinics on Mobile (AICOM): Universal AI Doctors for the Underserved and Hard-to-Reach
title.justification: This is the title as stated in the paper.
title.quote: AI Clinics on Mobile (AICOM): Universal AI Doctors for the Underserved and Hard-to-Reach

extractions.description: This paper introduces Artificial Intelligence Clinics on Mobile (AICOM), an open-source project that enables AI-based disease diagnostics and screening on resource-constrained mobile phones without internet connectivity, to maximize healthcare access for the underserved and hard-to-reach populations.

type.justification: The paper evaluates the AICOM system through a case study on monkeypox screening and provides empirical data on its performance.
type.quote: We have verified the effectiveness of AICOM methodologies through a case study on monkeypox screening tasks.

name.justification: The core focus of the research is on developing AI technologies for healthcare access, particularly for underserved and hard-to-reach populations.
name.quote: This paper introduces Artificial Intelligence Clinics on Mobile (AICOM), an open-source project devoted to answering the United Nations Sustainable Development Goal 3 (SDG3) on health, which represents a universal recognition that health is fundamental to human capital and social and economic development.

name.justification: The research emphasizes enabling healthcare access through mobile phones.
name.quote: AICOM empowers the underserved and hard-to-reach populations to use their mobile devices as a health care access tool, even without connectivity.

name.justification: The paper discusses various optimization techniques to enable deep learning models to run on resource-constrained devices.
name.quote: AICOM manages to greatly reduce model sizes so that health AI deep learning models can fit on resource-constrained devices.

name.justification: The paper introduces the AICOM-MP model for monkeypox screening.
name.quote: As illustrated in Figure 2, the key features of AICOM to enable health AI on resource-constrained mobile devices are as follows... For the technical details regarding the monkeypox screening deep learning model, please refer to [25].

is_contributed.justification: AICOM-MP is an original contribution introduced by the authors of the paper.
is_contributed.quote: In this paper we introduce Artificial Intelligence Clinics on Mobile (AICOM)... As illustrated in Figure 2, we have enabled an AI doctor for monkeypox screening and have achieved the state-of-the-art (SOTA) results.

is_executed.justification: The model runs entirely on CPUs of mobile devices, as detailed in the paper.
is_executed.quote: AICOM runs entirely on Central Processing Units (CPUs), which are the main computing resources on any mobile devices.

is_compared.justification: The paper compares the performance of AICOM-MP with other models, mentioning state-of-the-art results.
is_compared.quote: To demonstrate the effectiveness of AI doctors on affordable mobile phones without internet connectivity, we have enabled an AI doctor for monkeypox screening and have achieved the state-of-the-art (SOTA) results.

referenced_paper_title.value: AICOM-MP: An AI-based Monkeypox Detector for Resource-Constrained Environments
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the referenced paper for the AICOM-MP model as stated in the document.
referenced_paper_title.quote: For the technical details regarding the monkeypox screening deep learning model, please refer to [25].

name.value: World Bank Data on Life Expectancy and Health Expenditure
name.justification: The paper utilizes various datasets from the World Bank to analyze public health benefits.
name.quote: We have evaluated AICOMâ€™s public health benefits through analyzing data from the World Bank.

referenced_paper_title.value: World Bank: Life Expectancy, Health Expenditure, Total Population Statistics
referenced_paper_title.justification: The datasets from the World Bank are used for the empirical analysis in the study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Figure 1a summarizes the World Bank data illustrating the average life expectancy at birth of LDCs versus OECD member countries from 2006 to 2020.

name.justification: The paper introduces this dataset for model training and validation.
name.quote: We also release a medical image data repository for health AI researchers and developers to develop their own health AI models.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper mentions that the AICOM team has collected and made available medical image datasets.
referenced_paper_title.quote: The dataset of AICOM is available at [29].

name.justification: The paper mentions the use of TensorFlow for post-training quantization.
name.quote: Through INT-8 Post-training quantization [21], AICOM has achieved > 57x reduction of deep learning model sizes while maintaining 0% accuracy loss.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper for INT-8 post-training quantization is a TensorFlow documentation.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Through INT-8 Post-training quantization [21], AICOM has achieved > 57x reduction of deep learning model sizes while maintaining 0% accuracy loss.

name.justification: The paper uses the EQO technique for optimizing battery use.
name.quote: Through a context-aware resource control mechanism [22], AICOM utilizes energy-constrained quantization optimization (EQO) technique to achieve lower energy consumption.

referenced_paper_title.value: Power Saving in Mobile Devices Using Context-aware Resource Control
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper for EQO is titled 'Power Saving in Mobile Devices Using Context-aware Resource Control'.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Through a context-aware resource control mechanism [22], AICOM utilizes energy-constrained quantization optimization (EQO) technique to achieve lower energy consumption.
